heading: HR00066
0: A RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO URGE THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL COMMISSION TO ACKNOWLEDGE AS A HISTORICAL FACT THE CONCLUSIVE NATURE OF THE FULFILLMENT OF EVERY DETAIL OF THE BIBLICAL PROPHECY FORETELLING THE DIVINE COMMISSIONING OF BROTHER FELIX Y. MANALO, FROM THE ORIGIN IN TIME AND PLACE OF HIS EVANGELICAL WORK AND THE GEOGRAPHICAL POINT WHICH IT WOULD FIRST REACH AFTER THE FAR EAST (PHILIPPINES) TO THE FINE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING HIS COMMISSIONING, AS PROPHESIED IN THE HOLY SCRIPTURES, ON THE OCCASION OF THE 102ND ANNIVERSARY OF THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00066
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION FOR THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO URGE THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL COMMISSION TO ACKNOWLEDGE AS A HISTORICAL FACT THE CONCLUSIVE NATURE OF THE FULFILLMENT OF EVERY DETAIL OF THE BIBLICAL PROPHECY FORETELLING THE DIVINE COMMISSIONING OF BROTHER FELIX Y. MANALO, FROM THE ORIGIN IN TIME AND PLACE OF HIS EVANGELICAL WORK AND THE GEOGRAPHICAL POINT WHICH IT WOULD FIRST REACH AFTER THE FAR EAST (PHILIPPINES) TO THE FINE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING HIS COMMISSIONING, AS PROPHESIED IN THE HOLY SCRIPTURES, ON THE OCCASION OF THE 102ND ANNIVERSARY OF THE IGLESIA NI CRISTO
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2016-07-27
